page.title: Bay Networks BayStack 660 Wireless Access Point

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Bay Networks |model=BayStack 660 |revision=(US/CAN) |upc=704364082039 |asin= |manuf_country=Ireland |manuf=NetWave |availability=EoL |fcc_date=08/14/1998 |fcc_id=NALASPRO |ic_id=CANADA29031021111A |type=access point |pwr_v=6 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Hitachi |cpu1_model=SH7021 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29F400BR-70EC |ram1=0.5 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=KM681000CLT-7L |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Nortel NetWave AirSurfer Pro |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=AMD |wi1_chip1_model=Am79C930 |wi1_chip2_brand=Harris |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Harris |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=legacy (DSSS) |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Crystal |eth_chip1_model=CS8900-CQ |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=legacy (DSSS) |default_ssid=Default SSID |default_ssid_regex=^Default SSID$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:20:D8 |oui_eth=00:20:D8 }} "NETWAVE, INC. 1997" and "ASSY #: 100-1001-001 REV: [...]" :is silkscreened on the bottom of the board. "200-1001-001 REV. 4" is also etched onto this side of the board. The following is etched into the top (component side) of the board. 
WR JZ
IS GG
KH VN
The ''[[Hitachi]]'' SuperH processor is marked with "SH7021", :"HD" ™ "9A1S", "6437021TE20", and "C02 JAPAN". :The ''[[Crystal]]'' ISA Ethernet controller is marked with :"Crystal LAN", "CRYSTAL", "CS8900-CQ", "JTABFF9902". The board is also using a ''[[Lattice]]'' ispLS chip. *[[Nortel NetWave AirSurfer Pro]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/NALASPRO NALASPRO] (1100-600) :[[Nortel]] Networks ''NETWAVE AIRSURFER PRO WLAN PC CARD'' {{See also|Nortel WLAN Access Point 2330}} :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RVW2330 RVW2330] (''Nortel Networks, Inc.'') ===PSU=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''NetWave''' SA48-33A :120VAC ~ 60Hz, 14W -> 6VDC 1A, normal polarity :[positive center, negative shield].
